examples.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an IT support technician?
options: He works on routers and switches to establish a secure network.
He dismantles routers and switches to establish a secure network.
He paints routers and switches to establish a secure network.
examples.answer: He works on routers and switches to establish a secure network.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an IT support technician?
options: He fixes errors using diagnostic software tools.
He decorates system errors using diagnostic software tools.
He ignores system errors using diagnostic software tools.
content.answer: He fixes errors using diagnostic software tools.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an IT support technician?
options: He installs operating systems and updates security patches.
He removes operating systems and deletes security patches.
He hides operating systems and skips security patches.
content.answer: He installs operating systems and updates security patches.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an IT support technician?
options: He manages database backups to protect information.
He damages database backups to protect information.
He forgets database backups to protect information.
content.answer: He manages database backups to protect information.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an IT support technician?
options: He assembles hardware components such as processors and hard drives.
He destroys hardware components such as processors and hard drives.
He hides hardware components such as processors and hard drives.
content.answer: He assembles hardware components such as processors and hard drives.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an IT support technician?
options: He secures networks with firewalls and encryption protocols.
He paints networks with firewalls and encryption protocols.
He abandons networks with firewalls and encryption protocols.
content.answer: He secures networks with firewalls and encryption protocols.

activity_b.text: Nimal is an ICT trainee in the computer lab.
He works on system maintenance every day.
He usually starts at nine o’clock.
He checks the daily task list, switches on the workstation, and prepares the network tools.
He always follows the lab safety rules.
Nimal inspects the cables, routers, and switches.
He often installs software updates and checks the antivirus system.
He sometimes replaces a damaged LAN cable or resets a router.
He never forgets to test the firewall settings.
During every routine, Nimal logs into the server, verifies the backups, and monitors the storage usage.
He records the results and informs his instructor.
He usually troubleshoots system errors with diagnostic tools and documents the solutions.
At the end of the day, Nimal shuts down the systems, disconnects the test devices, and stores the equipment.
He always ensures that the server room is locked before leaving.
Nimal enjoys his ICT training because he learns problem-solving and gains technical knowledge.
